ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: That s one thing I love about this game...  It really isn t designed for any one particular age group,  it s Great for Everybody =D Katashaka Su
ygData.messageBody:
That's one thing I love about this game...  It' really isn't designed for any one particular age group,  it's Great for Everybody =D

Katashaka

  Su <suceress@...> wrote:

Yeah, it is amazing the range of ages of players. I've seen as young as 7
and as old as 75 playing. My mom plays and she's 52.
luv,
-Su

> If you don't mind me asking, How old are you two? The reason I ask is I
> would be curious as to what some of the ages people are who play. Since
> you mentioned your "retired" that really got me to wondering.  ;-)
>
> -----Original Message-----
